titleStmt.title: The inseparable union between Christ and a believer, which death itself cannot sever, or, The bond that can never be broken opened in a sermon at the funeral of Mrs. Dorothy Freeborne, who was interred at Prittlewell in Essex on 24 of August, 1658 / by Thomas Peck ...
titleStmt.author: Peck, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Parkhurst, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library (reel 1428) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2366).
